title.rendered: Musafir offers / coupon code – 5% off with FAB card

content.rendered:
You can get 5 % discount on round trip when you book on Musafir.com for the travel in all flights using your FAB card.

You can book until April 30, 2020 and travel until August 31st, 2020. Use the coupon code mentioned below and book.

Booking validity: April 30, 2020

Travel validity: August 31st, 2020

Coupon Code: FAB5

Book your flight tickets with Musafir and get 5 % discount using your FAB card

Terms and conditions:

*Offer valid for flights booked before 30th April, 2020 with a travel validity until 31st August, 2020. Discount offered only valid on base fare. No discount will be offered on surcharges & taxes. Offer entitles customers to flat 5% off (1 passenger max up to AED 20, 2 or more passengers max up to AED 40). Offer only valid for direct individual one-way or return flight purchases for adults and children booked on www.musafir.com with a valid FAB bank debit or credit card. Offer not valid for pre-packaged trips, trips booked through our travel experts or in conjunction with any other offer. Offer only valid if the coupon code is successfully entered before purchase. Offer will be deducted from any refunds due if a trip is cancelled in part or full. Offer may only be redeemed against one purchase on Musafir.com. Offer has no monetary value and cannot be reused, exchanged or refunded. Universal Travels & Tourism LLC reserves the right to withdraw this offer at its discretion and without notice.
